results.title: [Dynamics of structural-functional parameters of cardiovascular system during use of complex therapy of women with type 2 diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: Long-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in complex multifactorial therapy of @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with decompensated @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes DM@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@AH@@@ and @DISEASE_Obesity_Abdominal @DISEASE_MESH:D056128 @@@abdominal obesity@@@ provides improvement of @CHEMICAL_Carbohydrates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002241 @@@carbohydrate@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism, lowering of arterial pressure, diminishment of @DISEASE_Albuminuria @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@, @DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@diastolic dysfunction@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Isolated_Noncompaction_of_the_Ventricular_Myocardium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056830 @@@stiffness of left ventricular myocardium@@@.

citations.NLM: Onuchin SG, Elsukova OS, Solov'ev OV, Onuchina EL. [Dynamics of structural-functional parameters of cardiovascular system during use of complex therapy of women with type 2 diabetes mellitus]. Kardiologiia. 2010;50(5):29-35. PMID: 20831045
